title: What Does the 🧡 Orange Heart Emoji Mean?

steps.title: The 🧡 emoji says, “We’re friends!”
steps.content: The 🧡 emoji says, “We’re friends!” This orange-filled heart is the universal symbol for care and friendship. If your crush sends you an 🧡 emoji, they may be friend-zoning you. If a friend sends you an 🧡 emoji, you’re likely BFFs. [1] X Research source “You’re my person 🧡” “BFFs 4 eva! 🧡

steps.title: The 🧡 emoji conveys friendly support.
steps.content: The 🧡 emoji conveys friendly support. You may see an 🧡 emoji next to a heartwarming or encouraging message. If someone sent you this, they’re saying, “Hey, you’ve got this.” [2] X Research source “I believe in you 🧡” “Wishing I could be there, kiddo. But you’re going to be great! 🧡”

steps.title: An 🧡 emoji could mean they’re a bit shy.
steps.content: An 🧡 emoji could mean they’re a bit shy. The orange heart is one step away from being a ❤️, the ultimate symbol of love. Someone may send an 🧡 emoji if they're not quite ready to commit to saying “I love you” but still want to show they care. [3] X Research source “Thanks for always being there for me 🧡” “I really like you 🧡”

steps.title: Someone may use an 🧡 emoji if they love orange or fall.
steps.content: Someone may use an 🧡 emoji if they love orange or fall. If orange is their favorite color, chances are they’ll use this heart whenever they can! Along with this, the 🧡 emoji can be used for all things fall like Halloween and pumpkin picking. Ultimately, if it's orange, use an 🧡 emoji! “It’s an unpopular opinion, but orange is the best 🧡” “Fall is finally here!! 🧡

steps.title: When you’re talking to a friend:
steps.content: When you’re talking to a friend: Use the 🧡 emoji to tell your friend how much you cherish your friendship. You love your bestie unconditionally, so add this cheerful heart to the end of a text to show it. “What would I do without you, bestie? 🧡” “You’d kill me if I asked anyone else for fashion advice 😂🧡”

steps.title: When you’re being supportive:
steps.content: When you’re being supportive: Say “You’ve got this!” by adding an 🧡 emoji to an encouraging message. This is a great way to show a friend or crush that you’re sending them all the luck, care, and good vibes. “No matter what anyone says, you CAN do this 🧡” “We’re all cheering for you!!! 🧡🎉”

steps.title: When you’re not ready for commitment:
steps.content: When you’re not ready for commitment: Try using the 🧡 emoji if you’re not quite ready to say, “I love you.” There’s no need to rush to a ❤️ emoji right away! An 🧡 emoji can convey similar, but not as serious, emotions when added to the end of a flirty message . “Wanna go on another date sometime? I’d love to get to know you more 🧡” “I’ll be thinking about you tonight 😉🧡”

steps.title: When orange is your favorite color:
steps.content: When orange is your favorite color: If you love all things orange, put an 🧡 emoji in your bio or caption. This emoji can decorate your feed with your favorite color in the cutest way possible. Try adding it to your username or pairing it with other orange emojis. “🧡🧡 Amber 🧡🧡” “Orange is my favorite 🧡🍊🦧🥕🏀”

steps.title: When it’s fall:
steps.content: When it’s fall: Add an 🧡 emoji to your captions and tweets when talking about anything autumnal. Maybe the leaves are finally falling, and the pumpkins are out. If you're excited about fall festivities, spread the joy with an 🧡 emoji! “Spooky season is here 🕷️🧡👻” “First pumpkin spice latte of the season 🧡🎃”

steps.title: Send a heart back.
steps.content: Send a heart back. Whether it’s your best friend or crush, replying with an 🧡 emoji of your own says, “I care about you, too.” You can even send other colored heart emojis to personalize your message even more. Opt for a heart in your favorite color, or go straight for the ultimate love emoji, a ❤️. “You know I’m always here for you! No matter what 🧡” “I liked hanging out with you today too ❤️”

steps.title: Reply with a 🙂 emoji.
steps.content: Reply with a 🙂 emoji. This is a great way to show just how much they’re 🧡 emoji made you smile. Go for whichever smiley face emoji captures how you’re feeling. Maybe that’s a 😊 emoji, 😄 emoji, or even a 😚 emoji—the choices are endless! “Aw! That’s so sweet of you to say! You’re making me blush 😊” “Hehe you just made my day! 🙂”

steps.title: The 🧡 emoji is only one of many heart emojis.
steps.content: The 🧡 emoji is only one of many heart emojis. With a rainbow of colors to choose from, there’s a heart emoji for any and all occasions! Check out the most common meanings for all the heart emojis to see which best fits your mood: [4] X Research source ❤️ (red heart) - Love 🧡(orange heart) - Care 💛( yellow heart ) - Friendship 💚( green heart ) - Jealousy 💙( blue heart) - Peace 💜( purple heart) - Compassion or attraction 🖤( black heart ) - Sorrow 🤍( white heart ) - Purity 🩷 (pink heart) - Affection 🩶 (grey heart) - Neutrality 🩵 ( light blue heart ) - Warmth
